title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Trusting someone with the truth might be the highest honor you can bestow on them. But knowing that doesnt make your revelation any easier. It all depends on who the individual is to you, or what kind of relationship you wish to establish. Sometimes, its tricky balancing honesty as the best policy with divulging too much. However, the first person you must rely on to dispense frankness wisely is yourself. Who is next on your list depends on how close and influential you want them to be in your life. Author Simon Sinek penned, Trust is built on telling the truth, not telling people what they want to hear. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
